title: Indian auto industry poised to reach USD 300 Billion by 2026; Revving up for innovation and expansion
description: India's auto market aims for a USD 300 billion milestone by 2026, backed by rising income levels and urbanization. The industry showcases robust production figures and significant FDI inflow, positioning itself as a global automotive hub with a promising future.
